From Dallas, take TX-114 W toward Grapevine, take the exit toward FM-1709/Southlake Blvd. From Fort Worth, take TX-121 N, exit at William D. Tate Ave. From
, take TX-114 W, exit at Southlake Blvd.
To get around Southlake you'll definitley want to have a car. Taxis services to the airport (which is less than 10 minutes away) are available.

value: content=A huge high-end shopping center styled as an old town square. Newer additions include a European style plaza, 14-screen movie theatre, and more shops. For a list of shopping and dining options see the square's website.
content=A group of 70 volunteer muscians; see website for upcoming performances.
, off of N. White's Chapel Blvd., has hiking trails, a fishing pond, athletic fields, and a dog park.

content=Is a $15 million high school sports stadium that houses the Southlake Carroll Dragons American football squad, one of the best high school teams in the country. If you are in town anywhere from late September to December attend a game; tickets go for around $7 a person, open seating.
